name: TRAP
description: This command is used to set internal traps so that if a certain key is pressed the program will take an appropriate action.

parameters.name: trap_name_list
parameters.description: The name of the trap. These are listed below. You may include multiple trap names for a single trap command. Each of the traps will be set to the same values. This is generally used when you are setting a group of traps to IGNR (ignore) or DFLT (default).
